Subject: Bighard: A new challenger in the game
Paragraphs:
Hey team,

Have you guys heard about Bighard? They're a new player in the game, and they seem to be making some serious moves. I was doing some research on them, and they're really starting to gain some traction. It might be worth keeping an eye on them to see how they develop, and to make sure we're staying competitive.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best,
Adam
